voice_demo.title: Live E-commerce Support Demo
voice_demo.description: Real conversation with AI agent handling UAE online shopping customer service
voice_demo.transcript:
Customer: Hi, I placed an order yesterday but haven't received a confirmation email. Can you help me?

AI Agent: Hello! I'd be happy to help you with your order. May I have your order number or the email address you used to place the order?

Customer: I used sara.ahmed@email.com, and I think the order number was something like EC12345.

AI Agent: Perfect! I found your order EC12347 placed yesterday for AED 450. I can see the confirmation email was sent but might be in your spam folder. The order includes a wireless headset and phone case, with delivery expected tomorrow by 2 PM. I'm resending the confirmation now.

Customer: That's great! Can I also add express shipping to get it today instead?

AI Agent: Absolutely! I can upgrade you to same-day delivery for an additional AED 25. Your order will arrive today between 4-8 PM. Shall I process this upgrade for you?
